title: performance-analyzer skill
description: Analyzes code for performance bottlenecks and suggests optimizations
design: Detect N+1 queries, inefficient loops, unnecessary allocations, suggest optimizations
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Identifies bottlenecks
- [ ] Detects N+1 patterns
- [ ] Finds inefficient algorithms
- [ ] Suggests optimizations

title: Create new code-quality plugin
description: New plugin focused on code quality analysis: refactoring suggestions, security scanning, and performance analysis

title: commit-message-linter skill
description: Validates commit messages against conventionalcommits.org spec and suggests corrections
design: Parse commit message, check format/types/scopes, suggest fixes for violations
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Validates message format
- [ ] Checks type, scope, breaking changes
- [ ] Suggests corrections
- [ ] Pre-commit hook integration guidance

title: Enhance dev-utilities plugin with additional skills
description: Add skills for dependency management, testing, documentation, and worktree management

title: pr-conflict-resolver skill
description: Intelligently resolves merge conflicts by analyzing both branches. Note: /merge-conflicts command exists, this would be underlying skill
design: Parse conflict markers, analyze both sides, suggest resolution strategies
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Identifies conflict types
- [ ] Suggests resolution strategies
- [ ] Can auto-resolve simple conflicts
- [ ] Links to /merge-conflicts command

title: dependency-upgrader skill
description: Analyzes package dependencies and suggests upgrades with breaking change detection across ecosystems (npm, poetry, go.mod, cargo)
design: Parse dependency files, check for updates, analyze changelogs, detect breaking changes
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Supports npm, poetry, go.mod, cargo
- [ ] Detects available updates
- [ ] Identifies breaking changes
- [ ] Suggests migration paths

title: documentation-syncer skill
description: Detects code changes and identifies documentation that needs updating (README, API docs, etc.)
design: Parse code changes, detect API/interface changes, find related docs, suggest updates
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Detects API changes
- [ ] Finds related documentation
- [ ] Suggests updates
- [ ] Can generate doc updates

title: worktree-manager skill
description: Manages git worktrees for parallel work on multiple branches. Note: /worktree command exists, this would be underlying skill
design: Create/list/remove worktrees, manage branch associations, cleanup helpers
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Creates worktrees with proper setup
- [ ] Lists active worktrees
- [ ] Cleans up stale worktrees
- [ ] Links to /worktree command

title: pr-description-enhancer skill
description: Analyzes existing PR descriptions and suggests improvements (better title, missing context, unchecked boxes)
design: Parse PR description, analyze commit history, detect missing info, suggest improvements
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Analyzes PR title and description
- [ ] Detects missing context
- [ ] Suggests improvements
- [ ] Can apply updates automatically

title: refactoring-advisor skill
description: Analyzes code and suggests refactoring opportunities (DRY violations, complexity reduction, design patterns)
design: Static analysis for code smells, complexity metrics, pattern detection
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Detects DRY violations
- [ ] Identifies high complexity
- [ ] Suggests design patterns
- [ ] Provides refactoring guidance

title: code-review-assistant skill
description: Reviews PR diffs for common issues (security, performance, style, logic errors) and suggests improvements
design: Parse diff, run static analysis patterns, check against best practices, generate review comments
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Detects security issues
- [ ] Identifies performance problems
- [ ] Checks style consistency
- [ ] Finds logic errors
- [ ] Generates actionable feedback

title: changelog-generator skill
description: Generates CHANGELOG.md from conventional commits using semantic versioning principles
design: Parse git log for conventional commits, group by type, generate markdown with version sections
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Parses conventional commits
- [ ] Groups by type (feat/fix/break)
- [ ] Generates markdown format
- [ ] Supports version tagging

title: security-scanner skill
description: Scans code for common security vulnerabilities (SQL injection, XSS, hardcoded secrets, etc.)
design: Pattern matching for security anti-patterns, secret detection, OWASP top 10 checks
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Detects common vulnerabilities
- [ ] Finds hardcoded secrets
- [ ] Checks OWASP top 10
- [ ] Suggests fixes

title: Enhance commits plugin with additional skills
description: Add skills to improve commit workflow: splitting large commits, linting messages, and generating changelogs

title: Implement Capacities API plugin
description: Add plugin to integrate with Capacities knowledge management system, including API client, commands, and documentation

title: Create plugin structure and registration
description: Set up marketplace.json entry and plugin.json metadata for Capacities plugin

title: Implement capacities.py UV script
description: Python CLI with httpx client, token auth, caching, and handlers for spaces/search/weblink/daily-note

title: Create slash commands
description: Added list-spaces, space-info, search, save-weblink, and daily-note command docs

title: Write skill documentation
description: Created SKILL.md, API reference, workflow examples, and usage documentation

title: Enhance pull-requests plugin with additional skills
description: Add skills to improve PR workflow: description enhancement, comment handling, and code review assistance

title: test-generator skill
description: Analyzes code changes in a PR and generates corresponding test cases
design: Parse diff, identify functions/methods, generate test stubs with example cases
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Detects new/modified functions
- [ ] Generates test stubs
- [ ] Includes example test cases
- [ ] Supports multiple frameworks

title: commit-splitter skill
description: Analyzes large diffs and suggests how to split them into multiple atomic commits with proper scopes
design: Parse git diff, identify logical groups (by file/function), suggest commit boundaries with scopes
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Analyzes staged changes
- [ ] Identifies logical commit boundaries
- [ ] Suggests conventional commit messages for each split
- [ ] Can apply splits automatically or guide user

title: commit-splitter skill
description: Analyzes large diffs and suggests how to split them into multiple atomic commits with proper scopes
design: Parse git diff, identify logical groups (by file/function), suggest commit boundaries with scopes
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Analyzes staged changes
- [ ] Identifies logical commit boundaries
- [ ] Suggests conventional commit messages for each split
- [ ] Can apply splits automatically or guide user
